channel.title: Projects on Silas Bergen
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Silas Bergen

item.title: Data visualization: Principles and Practice with Tableau Public and Python
Web scraping and data visualization with Python and Tableau
Public data sources with social justice applications
item.description: Recently, I and some WSU student volunteers gave a talk at St. Olaf on great public data sources I have been using as sources of investigating “social justice” applications. Most of the ways I’ve used the data have been for class projects or assignments. That talk was an impetus to compile all the resources I’ve been using over the years, along with some example class projects using pre-aggregated data.
